summary: Completed comprehensive testing of LifeQuest Hero Telegram Mini App. All backend APIs (14 tests) passed. All frontend features working correctly including home screen, quests, profile, navigation, and quest completion flow.

issues: Avatar shows placeholder 'Level 1' text instead of actual avatar image - expected until n8n generates real avatar

critical_code_review_comments: Avatar placeholder is expected behavior - n8n webhook integration will generate real avatars
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
Russian localization is complete and consistent
seed_data_creation: Used existing test user with tg_id=123456789
context_for_next_testing_agent: Test user (tg_id=123456789) exists with PRO status activated. User has completed 3/10 daily quests. XP is at 65/100. All navigation tabs work. Quest confirmation modal works with 'Отмена' and 'Выполнил!' buttons.

home_screen.details: XP bar, level badge, 6 stats with values, avatar placeholder, PRO crown badge all display correctly

bottom_navigation.details: 4 tabs (Quests, Home, Profile, Sage). Home/Quests/Profile work. Sage is disabled as expected.

quests_tab.details: Shows list of 10 quests with XP rewards, completion status, branch labels. Counter shows 3/10 completed.

quest_confirmation_modal.details: Opens on uncompleted quest click. Shows quest title, XP reward, 'Отмена' and 'Выполнил!' buttons. Cancel closes modal.

quest_completion.details: Completing quest updates XP (tested: 45 -> 65 XP). Quest marked as completed.

profile_tab.details: Shows user info (Test/@testuser), level (1), total XP (45->65), branch (power), PRO status.

pro_subscription.details: PRO activation works via API. PRO badge displays on avatar and profile.

daily_quests_button.details: Button on home screen shows progress (3/10) and navigates to Quests tab.
